summary: Contractor notified ISO that he received information regarding an award notice from eOPF via email. The contractor went back through his email and found instructions for logging into eOPF. Using those instructions, the contract employee was able to reset a password, set answers to security questions and enter the account. The information contained in the eOPF was not his. Instead it applied to another employee (Employee B) with the same name and birth city. The contract employee said the file contained an Employee B's social security number, DOB and other sensitive information including employment paperwork.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
